questions.a: World UBI Coin is a Universal Basic Income platform that distributes regular payments to verified World ID holders.

questions.q: How do I start receiving UBI?
questions.a: Connect your World ID wallet and activate your UBI stream on the Earn page.
UBI accumulates continuously and can be claimed at any time.
Staking allows you to lock your tokens to earn additional rewards over time.
